record.field: Hello! Can you help me understand how to use this chat interface?

Hello! I'd be happy to help you get started with this chat interface. This is a ChatGPT-style chat system integrated into Odoo. You can:
1. Type messages in the text box at the bottom 2. Press Enter to send (or Shift+Enter for new lines) 3. I'll respond to your questions and help with various tasks 4. Chat history is automatically saved 5. You can create new chats anytime
What would you like to know more about?
